1123416737771347968.text: Most certainly sounds like @UNCC_Police is to be commended for their quick response to todays attack @unccharlotte. #CharlotteStrong #NinerStrong #UNCC

1123400465419579392.text: We are CHARLOTTE All We Know Is To KEEP POUNDING!!! It’s a way of life! We will bring light out of this tragedy. #CharlotteStrong

1123414849818644480.text: Thoughts & prayers with all of those at Charlotte affected by today’s tragedy. Charlotte is & will always be my home. This hurts. I pray that you & your families will be comforted during this time. Niner Nation, stay strong!

1123435189630394368.text: Our sports writer Drew Pescaro was one of those shot tonight. He is out of surgery and stable. The full support of the Niner Times staff is behind him in his recovery. #DrewStrong

1123386237774123008.text: Please don’t wait to tell the people you care about that you love them, tomorrow is never promised.

1123412593723543552.text: My thoughts and prayers are with my Alma Mater @unccharlotte @Charlotte49ers community and campus during this tragic and unfortunate moment.   #CharlotteStrong

1123440656083509248.text: I left work today at @KnightsBaseball to get to the hospital and wait to find out if a friend would be okay & we’re all so blessed to know that he and others will be. Some have not seen the same results & we have to keep all affected in our prayers. #CharlotteStrong #DrewStrong

1123429857642328064.text: Powerful moment as @wcnc wraps up their coverage with 49 seconds of silence...pic.twitter.com/P8mqK2tg2u

1123403659533017088.text: The @unccunion has been cleared and can now serve as a gathering place for students and staff. @NinerAlertspic.twitter.com/soXk7mBruA

1123369505621782529.text: This breaks my heart. What an awful world we live in. Lord shine your light on campus. Please be praying for our campus and for the families of the victims #CharlotteStrong

1123383448746516481.text: Y’all pray for my school man

1123414758907052033.text: Chief Baker with UNCC says they have technology that allows them to lock down every building on campus with the push of a button, and that’s what they did today

1123416839374147585.text:
We are #CharlotteStrong. Our thoughts and prayers are with those affected by today's tragedy at @unccharlotte. 

Our players will wear @Charlotte49ers hats during our 11:05 AM game on Wednesday.pic.twitter.com/6SGVWUUAEg – at BB&T Ballpark

1123428431771983874.text: We are heartbroken. We are angry. But most of all, we are strong together, a family of Niners who love our school and are here for one another. We hold the victims close in our hearts. #CharlotteStrongpic.twitter.com/6iyclmA1KM
